name: copilot-lineage-deriver
description: Generate lineage CSV files from XML using Copilot agent mode with @extract-lineage command

copilotLineageDeriver.mappingsFolderPath.description: Relative path to the folder containing mapping subfolders with XML files

copilotLineageDeriver.instructionsPath.description: Relative path to the instructions markdown file

copilotLineageDeriver.outputFolder.description: Relative path for the output CSV files

copilotLineageDeriver.delayBetweenReques.description: Delay between Copilot requests in milliseconds

copilotLineageDeriver.batchSize.description: Number of files to process in each batch

copilotLineageDeriver.enableBatchProcess.description: Enable batch processing for large numbers of files
